reference.shortdesc: The cmdname element specifies the name of a command when it is part of a software discussion.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: This element is part of the DITA software domain, a special set of DITA elements designed to document software tasks, concepts and reference information.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and keyref.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: Use the rm command when you wish to remove something forever.
